record.attribute: The NIAID-funded Eukaryotic Pathogen Genome Database (EuPathDB.org) invites proposals for Driving Biological Projects (DBPs) focused on one or more of the eukaryotic pathogens supported by this Bioinformatics Resource Center (BRC). We anticipate making two awards of up to $600K each by July 1, 2010 (a second round of solicitations is expected in 2012). A two page Letter of Intent (LOI) is due Feb 28, following which full applications will be solicited by invitation only, with a deadline of March 31. Click here to download the RFP.
